definition.title: Why Podcast Show Notes Matter
definition.content: Podcast show notes are how your episodes get discovered. Search engines can't index audio, so your written notes are the key to SEO. Good show notes also help listeners decide to press play and give them a reference during and after listening.

landingContent.formula: [EPISODE SUMMARY] + [GUEST BIO] + [KEY TAKEAWAYS] + [TIMESTAMPS] + [RESOURCES] = Complete Show Notes
tips: Write for scanners - most people skim; use bullet points and clear headers
Hook with the outcome - lead with what listeners will learn or gain, not just the topic
Include quotable moments - pull out the best one-liners for social sharing
SEO matters - search engines can't index audio; your notes are how episodes get found

examples.title: Interview Episode
examples.content:
SUMMARY: [Guest] shares how they [achieved outcome]. We discuss [topic 1], [topic 2], and why most people [common mistake].

KEY TAKEAWAYS:
• [Insight 1]
• [Insight 2]
• [Insight 3]

ABOUT [GUEST]: [Bio + links]

examples.title: Solo Episode
examples.content:
SUMMARY: In this episode, I break down my [framework/process] for [outcome]. You'll learn the [number] steps to [benefit], even if [common objection].

3 THINGS YOU'LL LEARN:
1. [Takeaway 1]
2. [Takeaway 2]
3. [Takeaway 3]

examples.title: Roundup Episode
examples.content:
SUMMARY: I've compiled the best advice from [X] guests on [topic]. These are the patterns that separate [successful outcome] from [failure].

FEATURED GUESTS:
• [Guest 1] on [their topic]
• [Guest 2] on [their topic]

faq.question: What should show notes include?
faq.answer: Episode summary, guest bio, key takeaways, timestamps, mentioned resources, and calls-to-action (subscribe, review).

faq.question: How long should show notes be?
faq.answer: 300-500 words for the summary, plus timestamps and resources. Enough for SEO and value, not overwhelming.

faq.question: Should I include timestamps?
faq.answer: Yes! Timestamps help listeners jump to sections they care about and improve engagement metrics.

faq.question: How do show notes help SEO?
faq.answer: Search engines can't index audio. Written show notes make your content discoverable and help rank for relevant keywords.
